Room Features

The City View Twin One Bedroom Suites offer quintessential Manhattan charm and feature four-fixture bathrooms. These 800 square foot suites are situated on floors 14 to 21. 

Bed & Bath Experience

This one-bedroom suite offers captivating views of New York City’s skyline. The suite offers an entry way with double door closet, a well-appointed living room featuring a comfortable sofa and coffee table overlooking the 40” wall mounted TV and console with minibar. There are 2 side chairs and side table along at the far side of the living room. An executive writing desk and chair completes the room.

The comfortable bedroom features either a king sized bed or twin beds, an armchair with side table on the far side of the room.  The twin bed set up has a nightstand between both beds with Bose Wave studio radio featuring Bluetooth connectivity and alarm clock. The four fixture Turkish marble-clad bathroom features a pedestal sink, 30 x 60" roll-in shower, removable bath seat, soaking tub with oversized showerheads, plush bathrobes, towels and luxurious Etro bath amenities.
